code: export var SIGN_IN="SIGN_IN";export var SIGN_OUT="SIGN_OUT";export var signInAction=function signInAction(userState){return{type:"SIGN_IN",payload:{isSignedIn:true,uid:userState.uid,username:userState.username}};};export var signOutAction=function signOutAction(){return{type:"SIGN_OUT",payload:{isSignedIn:false,uid:"",username:""}};};
